comments.author: BenCodie
comments.body: This creates precedent for any member of similar rank to expect their request for a username change (and render their old one as an AKA) to be granted. At least, that would seem fair to me. A consequence of this action as well, is Poker Player's profile now looks special in comparison to other legendary members, considering that he now has a custom title and a profile has customization that is unique in comparison to other legendary members.To make things fair on other legendary members, this change should be reversed, or a standard function should be added for all legendary members to do the same thing. I vote for the former. The decision to give this guy special treatment for such an insignificant reason was a big mistake in my opinion.
